meta.name: description
meta.content: The five districts of Allenstown, Chichester, Deerfield, Epsom, and Pembroke provide the pre-K -12 educational experiences for approximately 3500 students.

h2.a: Social Media – A Predators Playground Presentation – Chichester Central School

div.p: An Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force presentation called, "Social Media: A Predator's Playground" will be held at Chichester Central School. This is an informational presentation specifically geared towards parents, educators, and community leaders who...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-8466 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-chichester category-jobs-openings category-news

h2.a: Chichester Central School Full-Time Evening Custodian

div.p: Evening Custodian, Full Time Position open immediately until filled. This position is a full-time evening position (1:00-9:00 p.m.), switching to days (7:00-3:00) during the summer and school vacations. Chichester Central School is a K-8 school serving approximately...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-8419 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-deerfield category-jobs-openings category-news

h2.a: Long Term First Grade Substitute Needed for the 2019-2020 School Year – Deerfield Community School

div.p: Deerfield Community School is seeking a First Grade Long-Term Substitute Classroom Teacher, for maternity leave, with a start date mid to late February 2020 through the remainder of the school year. Qualifications: New Hampshire Teacher Certification in Elementary...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-8311 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-allenstown category-chichester category-deerfield category-epsom category-news category-pembroke category-sau

h2.a: 2020 NH Special Education Administrator of the Year

div.p: At its December 13th, 2019 meeting, the NH Association of Special Education Administrators (NHASEA) announced that Ms. Karen Guercia is the 2020 recipient of the NH Special Education Administrator of the Year. Ms. Guercia is the Assistant Superintendent of Student...

strong.em: The SAU 53 Central Office strives to facilitate and support the work of all schools, their faculty, staff, and boards in our shared commitment to provide a quality education to all students.
Our office values a pleasant, positive work environment, building good relationships, and the promotion of best practices in business and educational leadership.
